Tokyo FILMeX - WON - Grand Prize
Cannes Film Festival - NOMINATED - Palme d'Or
Chicago Film Festival - NOMINATED - Best Feature
Jerusalem Film Festival - NOMINATED - Best Israeli Feature

Filmed at Jerusalem, Israel

Modest to a fault, the introverted family drama Tehilim circles an unsolved mystery and unresolved emotions. Filmed in present-day Jerusalem, RaphaÃ«l Nadjari's minimalist tale studies the effects of loss on a middle-class Jewish family. When Eli Frankel inexplicably disappears after a car accident, his departure forces faith and pragmatism into bitter conflict.
